Module jGame
Package jGame.core.ui.hud

Class UIHudBoxElement

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.ui.hud.UIHudElement
jGame.core.ui.hud.UIHudBoxElement
public class UIHudBoxElement
extends UIHudElement
Creates a colored square.
Since:
1.1.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira

      Constructs a box element in the given location with the given dimensions, colored white.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal position of this element
      y - the vertical position of this element
      width - the width of this element
      height - the height of this element
      constraintType - the type of constraint to apply
      constraintValues - the values to apply when constraining this element
      Since:
      2.0.0
